title: wtf is going on (name removed) u scum
body:
playing with a fizz top with 80 cs while the enemy irelia has 200+
then there's this '(name removed)' player just does nothing but take cs even over his jg

i manage to win us 2 team fights and get to open nexus after what looked like was going to be a loss
then this (name removed) %%%got farms while the nexus is open. 
im trying to aa it but im fiddle
they all respawn and all our efforts were wasted.
then then xin keeps farming while they baron and get elder drake over the next 10 minutes
he goes top when the whole team is drake and doesnt respond to pings

why the fuck do we have players like that treating everyone in the game as bots playing a bot game just farming and doing nothing...not getting 1 drake for us and doing fk all for lanes.

fuck you (name removed) waste everyones efforst trying to come back u scummy fucking piece of shit

fuck you

i hope riot reads this and bans him
players like him are absoloutely worthless to the game and ruins it for everyone else

replies.body:
Look at you spamming Fiddlesticks and only managing 50%.

Did you pay to get out of Bronze? You can get banned for that mate.
i didnt say he was feeding he was just always at the wrong spot at the wrong time leaving us to die while he farmed one lane after the other and not pushing anything
i was with the team the whole time trying to cover objectives

Funny. He fed Less. Did more than you.

If he was trolling wtf were you doing

he never responded to anythig except for saying 'no' once in champ select. 
he is worse than useless and should be punished
